alert.note: Alert for Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 12 at 1:39AM CST until December 12 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR BREEZY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PARTS OF NORTH TEXAS... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning for breezy winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 11 AM this morning to 8 PM CST this evening. * TIMING...Late morning into early evening. * WINDS...South 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 13 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Mid to upper 60s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that start in this environment will be very difficult to control.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.
